p: The RVFV strain identified from the Arabian Peninsula in 2000 was embedded in lineage B with strains from Kenya, suggesting that this virus originated from Kenyan epizootics in 1997â€“1998. The outbreak was driven by floods and heavy rains along the Saudi Arabia-Yemen border in the Al Humayrha region, where the first cases were reported [ 55], and where it was maintained by Culex tritaeniorhynchus [ 56].
